release.action: Deprecated classes removed.
Old faulty code in ResourcepathMonitor removed (PatternTesting Runtime).
Bug in DescritptionUtils fixed (PatternTesting Runtime).
NetworkTester added (PatternTesting Runtime).
Methods deserialize(..) and assertNoFinalTransientAttribute(..) added in SerializableTester (PatternTesting Runtime).
Monitor class no longer can be registered as shutdown hook (PatternTesting Runtime).
Resource specific methods of ClasspathMonitor are now more and more moved to ResourcepathMonitor (PatternTesting Runtime).
ClasspathDigger refactored and tested in Spring environment (PatternTesting Runtime).
Switched to Log4j 2.
Java 5 will be no longer supported.
Classloader of Tomcat 8 is supported now for ClasspathMonitor (PatternTesting Runtime).
FileTester prints now filename if files differ (PatternTesting Runtime).
ClassTester added to check static initializer of classes (PatternTesting Runtime).
You are now able to ignore e.g. white spaces in FileTester / IOTester by using a StringConverter as additional argument (PatternTesting Runtime).
Sequence diagrams can be now generated as simple text files which can be used as input for https://www.websequencediagrams.com/ (PatternTesting Runtime).
Finetuning of generated sequence diagrams (PatternTesting Runtime).
Generated sequence diagrams no longer have double messages (PatternTesting Runtime).
Samples for JFS 2015 extended and updated.
NPE fixed for empty @DrawSequenceDiagram annotation (PatternTesting Runtime).
Packaged 'patterntesting.concurrent.experimental' removed (PatternTesting Concurrent).
ZombieAspect logs use of @Zombie classes and methods (PatternTesting Check-RT).

DB connections can be now monitored by ConnectionMonitor together with ProxyConnection (PatternTesting Runtime).

ObjectTester.assertEquals(..) checks now, if null as argument is handled correct in the equals method (PatternTesting Runtime).
Bug fixing release.

Switched from commons-logging to SLF4J.
IOTester and FileTester added (PatternTesting Runtime).
Improved startup time for ClasspathMonitor (PatternTesting Runtime).
The checkXxx methods in the different tester (ObjectTester, SerializableTester, CloneableTester) are renamed to assertXxx (PatternTesting Runtime).
Suppressing "adviceDidNotMatch" warning.
The "till" argument in @Broken can handle now simple times like "18-Mar-2011 17:55" (PatternTesting Runtime).

Deprecated aspects (BrokenAspect, IntegrationTestAspect, RunTestOnAspect, SkipTestOnAspect) for JUnit tests removed. Use "@RunWith(SmokeRunner.class)" in your JUnit tests for that functionality (PatternTesting Runtime).
Deprecated @RunTestsParallel and ParallelRunnerAspect removed. Use "@RunWith(ParallelRunner.class)" to run JUnit methods parallel (PatternTesting Concurrent)
Begin with Maven plugin for compiling with PatternTesting libs (PatternTesting Tools).
Checkstyle warnings reduced.
Class cycles between packages are now eliminated.
PMD errors fixed.
OnlyForTestingAspect works now also for JUnit3 test code (PatternTesting Check.CT).
ZipExceptions are enriched by the name of the zip file (PatternTesting Exception).
@LogRuntimeException and @LogThrowable works now for static methods inside the annotated class (PatternTesting Runtime).

Code cleanup.
